entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 108 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 110 IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 105 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
